mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INQUIRY (HELP_CATEGORY_CODE, WRITER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{helpCategoryCode}, #{writerId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NO FROM TB_INQUIRY ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_INQUIRY
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.title}, '%')
AND HELP_CATEGORY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.category}, '%')
AND RESULT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.result}, '%')
AND WRITER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.writer}, '%')
SELECT I.*, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_INQUIRY I left join tb_help_category C on C.HELP_CATEGORY_CODE = I.HELP_CATEGORY_CODE WHERE INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
SELECT INQUIRY_RESULT_NO FROM TB_INQUIRY_RESULT ORDER BY INQUIRY_RESULT_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_QUESTION
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.title}, '%')
AND HELP_CATEGORY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMap.category}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_QUESTION (HELP_CATEGORY_CODE, QUESTION_CONTENT, ANSWER_CONTENT) VALUES (#{helpCategoryCode}, #{questionContent}, #{answerContent})
